title: The Great Resignation Is Great for Low-Paid Workers
itunes:title: The Great Resignation Is Great for Low-Paid Workers
description:
Tara Kirk Sell, Senior Scholar at the Johns Hopkins Bloomberg School of Public Health, shares her thoughts on misinformation around the vaccine. Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Justin Fox explains why the Great Resignation is about lower-income people getting the chance to move up. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Cross Asset Reporter Katie Greifeld discuss Katie's Businessweek cover story Getting Inflation Right Is a Make-or-Break Trade on Wall Street. Petco CEO Ron Coughlin talks about earnings growth and the pandemic pet boom. Bloomberg News Retail Reporter Jordyn Holman breaks down earnings from Macy’s and Kohl's. And We Drive to the Close with Christian Munafo, Portfolio Manager of The Private Shares Fund.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
